title: Department of Justice and FTC Launch Inquiry Into Event Ticketing Business
description: Members of the public are invited to submit comments "on harmful practices and on potential regulation or legislation to protect consumers in the industry" through July 7.
author: Chris Eggertsen

title: 3 Doors Down Singer Brad Arnold Reveals Stage 4 Kidney Cancer Diagnosis: ‘I Have No Fear’
description: Due to Arnold's diagnosis, the band is canceling its upcoming summer tour.
author: Katie Atkinson

title: 3 DOORS DOWN's BRAD ARNOLD Diagnosed With Stage 4 Kidney Cancer, Band Cancels Tour Plans
description: It's metastasized to his lungs as well. The post 3 DOORS DOWN's BRAD ARNOLD Diagnosed With Stage 4 Kidney Cancer, Band Cancels Tour Plans appeared first on Metal Injection.

title: The Days of Tangled DJ Cables Are Over Thanks to AIAIAI's Breakthrough Wireless Headphones
description: Artists everywhere are throwing away their TRS cables thanks to the wireless wizardry of the TMA-2 DJ Wireless, which AIAIAI calls "the first-ever headphones designed for true wireless DJing."
author: Jason Heffler

title: Listen to Destructo, MxNxSTxR, Channel Tres and Thundercat's Breezy Collab, "What You Need"
description: A disco-fueled escape hatch, the star-studded track is out now via All My Friends and Empire.
author: Jason Heffler

title: Amy Poehler Reunites with Mike Schur for New Peacock Comedy Dig
description: The new series is the first collaboration between Poehler and Schur since Parks and Recreation. Amy Poehler Reunites with Mike Schur for New Peacock Comedy Dig Daysia Tolentino

title: Kevin Smith’s Dogma to Screen at This Year’s Cannes
description: The 1999 religious satire will be an official Cannes Classics selection for the 2025 festival. Kevin Smith’s Dogma to Screen at This Year’s Cannes Liz Shannon Miller

title: Google has launched a film and TV production house with Range Media Partners. What does that mean for the future of music rightsholders?
description: Google becoming an entertainment IP owner might just make the company more conscious of the value of IP Source
